snippet: The Franklin Institute’s new permanent exhibition, “Your Brain,” immerses visitors in the human body’s most complicated and astounding part.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews exhibits Your Brain, Circus! Science Under the Big Top and 101 Inventions That Changed the World at Franklin Institute in Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: The Franklin Institute’s new permanent exhibition, “Your Brain,” immerses visitors in the human body’s most complicated and astounding part.

headline.seo: ‘Your Brain’ Opens at the Franklin Institute
headline.main: A Show That Really Gets Into Your Head
headline.print_headline: A Show That Really Gets Into Your Head
